thread.title: Scherzer throws his 2nd no-hitter this year, Nats sweep Mets
thread.title_full: Scherzer throws his 2nd no-hitter this year, Nats sweep Mets

title: Scherzer throws his 2nd no-hitter this year, Nats sweep Mets
text:
> Top News Scherzer throws his 2nd no-hitter this year, Nats sweep Mets New York Mets' Michael Conforto, left, David Wright, center and Curtis Granderson, right, leave the dugout after the Mets lost to the Washington Nationals 2-0 in second baseball game of a doubleheader, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in New York. Nationals starting pitcher Max Scherzer threw a no hitter. (AP Photo/Kathy Kmonicek) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
